answers.answer: If you have diabetes, are taking steroids, or any condition that renders you immunosuppressed  you should promptly see a physician. If you have fevers or redness, promptly see a physician.  Use of  antimicrobial soap and assure the area remains dry and not moist would be prudent.  You sound very worried, and visiting your personal physician will help identify the problem as well as help you sleep better.

question: I got these round lumps on my testicles as if they were ingrown hair some of them have oozed out dry puss when i squeeze them its scaring me that i might have an std i pray to God that i dont so if i could get some help with identifying this it would be much thanked
title: i dont know what it is
